content: I'm not even half way through, but I like it. Mad props for having controller support! Steelseries stratus duo works great with it. If a boss seems too hard, a little grinding for upgrades (and practice) can help. Difficulty increase seems about right as more complex maneuvers are required as your skill increases. The quick auto restart level at death is nice and frustration less.
replyContent: Thanks a lot for your review, really appreciate it :)

content: Blahh
Bad controls impossible to control character
replyContent: Hi! I'm sorry to see you are having issues with controls, I'll be more than glad to assist you if you contact support. You can also modify the size and position of the controls to fit your needs, we have really worked a lot to make sure controls are comfortable on every device :)

content: Sloppy controls, even with the dpad or moving it around, the direction control is clunky, getting stuck in place with bow, swapping to sword after each boss dialogue is confusing, wall sliding mechanics unclear, not a bad idea but needs chiselling.
replyContent: Thanks a lot for your review, really appreciate the improvement suggestions. We worked really hard on super customizable controls as we know it would be the number 1 issue on mobile devices. They are completely customizable in the pause menu and also has gamepad support :) Thanks, and if you need any help please contact support :D

content: Good

My biggest issue is that I cannot see where I'm going when I have to go up or down. I tried both "full screen" & "scale" options in the settings. The HQ audio is a bit unfitting for a pixelated game. Also, I don't wanna talk to the soul, I just wanna play. Lastly, when all new phones have screen cutouts, it is unfortunate that this game doesn't support full screen on such screens
replyContent: Hi Murad! First a lot for playing Unbroken Soul  and your review, not really sure what might be happening as nothing you are staying should happen. Could you please contact support so we can help you?

content: Bad controls. You cant fire and jump straight after making for some infuriating moments

I'm sorry to see you aren't liking controls. You can jump once the attack has finished which takes less than 0.5 seconds. I can help you if you reach support mail or even offer you a refund.

content: Perfect game, the story is great and I think it is a little bit hard but it is still a very good game

content: I feel like I'm playing my Super Nintendo again, bravo! It's a very unforgiving game, with punishment around every corner, but you're rewarded appropriately for your efforts.

content: This game is fun and interesting as it makes for some great story and action to play on the go or inside and i have played it with touch controls most of the time with little to no issues so far it is fun and worth a play for many people

If you have any other issues feel free to reach support any time!

content: Pixel art and level design are only okay. Coin drops from enemies and chests take waaay too long and the structure of the market is annoying and needlessly time consuming. Upgrades are bland and unsatisfying. Story and translation are barely decent, if not very cliche and cheesy, but at least there was some semblance of effort put into here for the story and worldbuilding. Boss fights are decent. Controls are actually pretty good but the menu system and font are bad. This is simply a meh game.
The game is really perfect for timepass. Mostly in this lockdownüòä.
Mynlth castle level 4 is really hard but i passed it anyways. Good and very challenging game
Great game and it's free!
An extremley fun game, especially when there are usually no fun games on this google play store.
This game. I like this game. This game likes me. I like this game. We all like eachother :D
Nice game
It really nice üëå

content: üëç
Somehow missing a concluding ending after beating the Last Boss but a great game in every aspect
The game is frustratingly fun. The level designs are amazingly challenging too. Great game!

This game is so good. No lag as some are experiencing. Super responsive controls. The bosses are not too hard but you will have to play them a few times to figure out their movements and attacks. Each boss is a puzzle to be solved and some of the platforming is the same way. Know that going in and you'll love it!
It is a pretty good game
Xd
Good idea, bad gameplay. Getting hit in areas that are meant to be avoid damage areas. Lazy hitbox.

I love the idea of the more old school adventure game and this game does it fairly well, though one thing that I don't like is the fact that to enter a door or talk to one of the people who upgrade your gear, you have to touch the screen. It seems like a small thing but it ruins the retro feel of the game having to touch the screen instead of the controls, an alternative would be to press A to interact with the NPC's and doors. All in all a good game except for this small personal dislike

content: I've leveled up all my items to 20k+ per upgrade yet I still can't beat the final boss. I've tried on easy mode yet legendary and easy barely changes anything. How hard can this thing get. Like actually to difficult...
replyContent:
Thanks a lot for your review!

I'll give you a big tip, Use Guluun as a checkpoint, grab as many potions as possible from his slugs, try not to defeat him quickly. Also, once you reach Elaniof, you can only damage him with the double jump attack ;)

Good luck, you will be very happy once you defeat him. Join our discord server if you need more tips

content: Tight and responsive controls. Engaging gameplay so far. The pixel art is not stunning, but it really doesn't need to be. As I look at the prices for upgrades, I can only assume that I'll be failing a LOT. So I hope it stays interesting enough for me to want to overcome the challenges. Two minor issues, though. I don't mind bosses wanting to break your flow, but text boxes in the middle of a fight are a crutch. And the physics call for a metroidvania map: I just want to take this guy exploring.
replyContent: Thanks for your review :) Your feedback will definitely shape future updates. Hope you enjoy the rest of the game and yes it keeps getting harder and harder, get ready for a huge challenge ;)

Restart should take you to the current level you are at and exit should always take you to town right. However, some other users have also told us that they would like exit to close the game, will change that in next update :)

content: Gotta give it up, this is a great game. Controls much better than you'd expect; a rare encounter for an Android side scroller. It's challenging, even on easy mode. Perhaps a bit too challenging. All in all, I'm quite impressed. Glad I downloaded this. Thanks Dev! Only one thing I'm wondering... Do you have to force close in order to leave the game? Would much prefer something like 'Save & Quit' over a force close. Thanks again.
I've loved every aspect of it! Thanks for the controller support as well.

3 stars for now. The game is very good, fun, and very responsive. Downside no matter how much one upgrades their weapons, armor, and bow the enemies are still OP. I have upgrade my weapons to the point where I have spend 4k on them and the 1st level boss and other non boss enemies still kill me at the same rate. And I will have to hit them 3 to 4 times to beat them and this is the game on easy. Kinda hard for an app game. But I still like it keep up the good work it worth playing it. 5 star for updates and very fast response. great company and great game Love it!!!
replyContent: Hey Robert! New update gives extra health to the player when lowering the game difficulty, melee combat has been improved and knockback has been readjusted. Hope you enjoy the new changes, sounds like what you are looking for ;)

content: GREAT GAME!!!!

content: Got 2 stars cus it had a mimic chest like in dark souls.... But unfortunately nothing like it.... Controls were clunky..... Hit jump and he didn't jump.... Just frustrating controls really..... Needs to be smoother and maybe a shield or something for defence other than a dodgy jump button.... Good potential here.....
replyContent:
Hi Dean,

Thanks for playing and for your feedback :)
There are some other weapons and skills you'll unlock that will make everything easier. Also, melee combat has been improved and controls are extremely responsive, try adjusting them to your needs in settings, I'm sure you will see a huge difference :D

content: A very good game (felicitaciones a los creadores). The controls are responsive, and the animations plus the pixel art graphics look great. Also, the music is very fitting to the game's world. The different areas are varied enough, and there's always something new in each one of them. The English translation could definitely be improved, since much of the dialogs are not very well translated. Overall a good experience, especially for its price!
replyContent: Thanks a lot for your review Ivan :D We will definitely send them to more proofreaders to always continue improving the game :)

content: I really love this game, but it has a serious fault. The good thing is that it can be fixed easily. You have to sit through every boss cutscene, every time. It gets frustrating when they are killing you a lot. [EDIT] I had no idea you could use the menu to start at the beginning of a level! That was an oversight on my part. The devs already said they are adding a way to skip the cutscenes in the next update. Fast response. Definitely try this game!
replyContent: Hey Arthur! Thanks a lot for your review :D About the first issue, you can actually travel to any level you have already played, go to the pause menu, select travel, the world you want to enter and then the level you want to go. Definitely farming will help a lot to defeat some hard bosses. About the cutscene, that will be removed in next update :)

content: From what I've played so far in this game, it's very fun. The game controls are very responsive.The game runs very smooth and the music is great.The only gripe that I have is the short kind of "blip" sound when pressing buttons A and B. I wish there was a way to remove that particular sound completely. Also, there is clearly no exit to home button. Other than that, this game is another one of those gems that every retro player should look into. Well worth the small price the dev is asking.üëçüèª
